title: RVP:Baseball & Softball video

descriptionHTML:
RVP BASEBALL AND SOFTBALL SWING ANALYSIS APP AND PITCHING ANALYSIS APP for Android Phones and Tablets!
RightView Pro is the only video analysis software company licensed by MLB, MLBPA and NPF.

OFFICIALLY LICENSED PRODUCT OF MAJOR LEAGUE BASEBALL PLAYERS ASSOCIATION-MLBPA trademarks and copyrighted works, including the MLBPA logo, and other intellectual property rights are owned and/or held by MLBPA and may not be used without MLBPA’s written consent. Visit www.MLBPLAYERS.com, the Players Choice on the web.

APP HIGHLIGHTS –
Compare your swing and pitching motion to Major League Baseball Players, National Pro Fastpitch players, USSSA Slowpitch Professionals and Area Code Game Top Baseball Prospects.

Access MLB All-Stars and the Top Softball players in the world.
Josh Hamilton
Stephen Strasburg
Matt Kemp
Albert Pujols
Tim Lincecum
Jered Weaver
Jessica Mendoza
Cat Osterman
Natasha Watley
Danielle Lawrie
Don DiDonotis Jr.
Andy Purcell
…among many others!!!

CAPTURE:
*Record and Import Videos
*Trim, Edit Video
*Playback in Slow-mo, frame-by-frame

COMPARE:
*Split-Screen Swing Analysis (Premium Benefit)
*Flip/Mirror, Zoom, Overlay Swings
*Landscape or Vertical Orientation
*All Pro Swings shot at 60 fps
*Full Suite of Analysis Tools

SHARE:
*Create free online “locker” to store swings
*Submit/View Analyzed Clips from RVP Instructor
*Email Screenshot of analysis and video
*Access to Drill/Tips from RVP Coaches
*View RVP YouTube Channel for more tips
*Print your Snapshot on a WiFi printer

*******************

Purchasing the RVP Premium Unlocker grants users:
*Split-screen Comparison
*Unlimited Model Downloads
*All ads removed

*****************
comments: App not working well on S7. When you hit record they're is about a 7 second delay before it actually starts recording. Not good in a game situation when you are trying to get video of a swing etc
Won't open videos Imported video, trimmed video saved as new file , & I'm still not open
Easiest app for breaking down pitching and hitting! Tool

Clunky and poorly designed and a rip off too Update: after the update it now tells me my free version has expired! After I paid for an in app purchase. Stay away from this app. Stay far away! Poor interface including references to a golf app that this must be based on. Expect more than this. Does not deliver on in app purchases either. I paid for 3 models and it only lets me download one.
Great baseball coach training aid Great tool for little league coaches to show their players What they do and what you want instead.
Love it! Great tool to help my little league team!
